snippet: The New England Patriots activated Tom Brady from the NFL exempt list Saturday, bringing the 21-month "Deflategate" saga to an end....
lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots activated Tom Brady from the NFL exempt list Saturday, bringing the 21-month "Deflategate" saga to an end.

headline.main: Patriots Activate Brady and 'Deflategate' Comes to an End
headline.print_headline: Patriots Activate Brady and 'Deflategate' Comes to an End
